A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase certain funeral benefits for veterans, and for other purposes.
BRAVE Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Burial Rights for America's Veterans' Efforts Act of 2017 or the BRAVE Act of 2017
This bill increases the amounts payable through the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) for: (1) burial and funeral expenses of certain veterans, and (2) such expenses in connection with a veteran's death due to a service-connected disability.
The VA shall increase such amounts each fiscal year by the percentage increase in the Consumer Price Index.
